dmca.title: US Registered Trademark Infringement
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page 13964.sh12o9q.info any of the
material that you claim is being infringed as of 10:37:16 a.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 




> *From:* David M Higgins [mailto:webmaster@darkreach.com] *Posted At:* 
> Saturday, October 07, 2006 2:31 AM *Posted To:* Copyright
> *Conversation:* FW: US Registered Trademark Infringement
> *Subject:* Re: FW: US Registered Trademark Infringement
> 
> Go to this page - http://13964.sh12o9q.info/
> 
> Look at the source of the page
> 
> and there it is!
> 
> 
> It is really quite simple
> 
> Is this your standard response to every infringement complaint?
> 
> David Higgins
> 
> At 01:34 AM 5/10/2006, you wrote:
> 
>> We are unable to locate on the web page  http://13964.sh12o9q.info/ 
>> any of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 10:33:42 
>> a.m. (GMT-6).<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = 
>> "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
>>
>>  
>>
>> Legal Response Team
>>
>> ThePlanet.com
>>
>>  
>>
>> *From:* David M Higgins [mailto:webmaster@darkreach.com] *Posted At:*

>> Tuesday, October 03, 2006 6:00 PM *Posted To:* Copyright
>> *Conversation:* US Registered Trademark Infringement
>> *Subject:* US Registered Trademark Infringement
>>
>> October 4th  2006
>>
>> Darkreach Communications International Pty Ltd P.O. Box 1843 
>> CARINDALE Queensland 4152 AUSTRALIA
>>
>> ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
>> 1333 North Stemmons Freeway
>> Suite 110
>> Dallas
>> TX
>> 75207
>> USA
>>
>>
>> Dear Sir or Madam,
>>
>> It has come to my attention that a domain -  sh12o9q.info   - that is
>> hosted by The Planet on the IP - 74.52.79.251 -  contains elements 
>> that are direct infringements of  our US Registered Trademark.
>>
>> Namely the text
>>
>> " Free *dangerdave* porn " and " Freae *dangerdave* porn "  and " 
>> Frue
>> *dangerdave* porn "
>>
>> within the page - http://13964.sh12o9q.info/
>>
>>
>> I am the registered proprietor in the United States of the trademark:
>> Dangerdave. (Serial Number 75637813)
>>
>> As you are aware, I have for many years provided legal adult material

>> on the internet. As a result of my activities, the Dangerdave 
>> trademark has become extremely well known in the adult website space.
>>
>>
>> Your customer's conduct amounts to blatant infringement of the 
>> Dangerdave trademark in respect of which I am entitled to institute 
>> proceedings for trademark infringement against your customer and your

>> company.
>>
>> Your customer's conduct is both misleading and deceptive.
>>
>> In addition, your customer's conduct constitutes passing off and the 
>> making of false representations and breaches.
>>
>> I have been advised by my solicitors that I am entitled to institute,

>> immediately, legal proceedings against your company and would be 
>> entitled to an injunction preventing you and your customer from:-
>>
>> 1. Using the Dangerdave trademark in any manner whatsoever; and 2. 
>> Continuing to make false and misleading representations in relation 
>> to the services it offers on the internet.
>>
>> I would be entitled at my election to damages on account of your 
>> customer's and/or your company's profits and my legal costs.
>>
>> Unless you cooperate with my request, I will instruct my solicitors 
>> to immediately institute legal proceedings against you.
>>
>> I demand that you immediately remove the pages so that it is not 
>> substantially identical or misleading, deceptive or confusingly 
>> similar to my trademark.
>>
>> Unless you fail to comply strictly with my demand within 5 days from 
>> the date of this letter, I will be instructing my solicitors to 
>> immediately commence legal proceedings against your company and be 
>> seeking both interlocutory and permanent injunctions with an account 
>> of profit.
>>
>> Facsimile referencing this email to follow
>>
>>
>> Yours sincerely,
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>> David Higgins
>> Owner/Director
>> Darkreach Communications International Pty Ltd
>> Phone: 61 7 38434896
>> Email: webmaster@darkreach.com
>> DangerDave(r) is a US Registered Trademark
